document_data.mainbody:
he Watermaster was a hobgoblin sometime after the War of the Silver Marches.
In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, the Watermaster was one of the minions of the hill giant Chief Guh in Grudd Haug. His duty was to catch fish from the river, take care of the dam, and guard the dens supply of rations.
